mapper.select: SELECT r.*, i.fileName FROM `FR_RECIPE` AS r, `FR_IMAGE` AS i WHERE r.seq = i.recipe_id GROUP BY r.seq LIMIT 12;

SELECT r.*, i.fileName FROM `FR_RECIPE` AS r INNER JOIN `FR_IMAGE` AS i ON r.seq = i.recipe_id WHERE (cate=#{cate} or #{cate}='') AND (cooking_level=#{cooking_level} or #{cooking_level}='')
AND (cooking_time_h = 0 and cooking_time_m <= 30)
AND cooking_time_h=1 OR (cooking_time_h=0 and cooking_time_m>=30)
AND cooking_time_h >=1
r.ingredients LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item},'%')
GROUP BY r.seq;
SELECT r.*, i.fileName FROM `FR_RECIPE` AS r INNER JOIN `FR_IMAGE` AS i ON r.seq = i.recipe_id WHERE r.rdate > (NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY r.seq ORDER BY r.hit LIMIT 12;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `FR_RECIPE_REVIEW` SET uid=#{uid}, nick=#{nick}, recipe_id=#{recipe_id}, rating=#{rating}, comment=#{comment}, credate=NOW(), regip=#{regip};
mapper.update: UPDATE `FR_RECIPE` SET review=review+1 rating=(rating+#{rating}/review+1) WHERE seq=#{seq};
